name: Pooping Birds
description:
As a bird you will poop and flap your way to the top! But watch out for the various enemies/obstacles. They just might ruin your day. Attack them with your poop to score points! One button controls like flappy bird (Space bar on PC). Various levels to try and master and beat your top score.

In-development side project made with Unity available on Windows/Mac/Linux and Android. All levels are not finished.

Feedback is always appreciated :)

Assets from Unity Asset Store and Sithjester (http://untamed.wild-refuge.net/rmxpresources.php?characters).
